cmput301.f13t01.elasticsearch

Class ESManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301.f13t01.elasticsearch.ESManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LibraryManager

    public class ESManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements LibraryManager
    This class is designed to interact with stored stories on ElasticSearch. Saving, Loading, and Deleting are handled.
    Author:
    Jesse Chu, Reginald Miller, Jesse Huard

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ESManager(android.content.Context context)
      Initializes the ESClient and gets the LocalManager.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.UUID downloadStory(java.util.UUID id)
      Saves a story from the server.
      java.util.UUID getRandomOnlineStory()
      When this method is called, it handles the process of fetching a random story amongst all stories available on the server.
      Story getStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
      Method that returns a requested Story by ID and fetches all associated resources.
      java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryInfoList()
      Method to return an ArrayList of first batch of StoryInfo objects

      Fetches first batch of StoryInfos starting from the index start.
      boolean isBusy()
      Checks if the ESManager is currently communicating with the ES Server.

      Method to remove/delete a Story and all associated files from the server.

      Publishes the story and all its resources to the server.

      Returns an ArrayList of StoryInfo objects that match the results of what was desired to be searched from the Browse Online Stories activity

      • getRandomOnlineStory

        public java.util.UUID getRandomOnlineStory()
        When this method is called, it handles the process of fetching a random story amongst all stories available on the server.
        Returns:
        Returns the random Story object.

      • getStoryInfoList

        public java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryInfoList()
        Method to return an ArrayList of first batch of StoryInfo objects
        Specified by:
        getStoryInfoList in interface LibraryManager
        Returns:
        an ArrayList of all StoryInfo

      • getStoryInfoList

        public java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> getStoryInfoList(int start)
        Fetches first batch of StoryInfos starting from the index start. Call this if want new batch of StoryInfo objects.
        Parameters:
        start - The start index of which StoryInfos to fetch (equal to current total number of StoryInfos)
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of StoryInfos of size resultSize (or less if no more on server)

      • downloadStory

        public java.util.UUID downloadStory(java.util.UUID id)
        Saves a story from the server.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the story to be posted.
        story - The story to be posted.

      • removeStory

        public boolean removeStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
        Method to remove/delete a Story and all associated files from the server.
        Specified by:
        removeStory in interface LibraryManager
        Parameters:
        storyId - the ID of the Story to remove
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • saveStory

        public boolean saveStory(java.util.UUID id,
                Story story)
        Publishes the story and all its resources to the server.
        Specified by:
        saveStory in interface LibraryManager
        Parameters:
        id - Current ID of the story to be published
        story - The story to be saved
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • searchOnlineStories

        public java.util.ArrayList<StoryInfo> searchOnlineStories(java.lang.String title,
                                                 java.lang.String author,
                                                 java.lang.String description,
                                                 int start)
        Returns an ArrayList of StoryInfo objects that match the results of what was desired to be searched from the Browse Online Stories activity
        Parameters:
        title - The input text of the title field
        author - The input text of the author field
        description - The input text of the description field
        start - The index to start searching for the objects
        Returns:
        The ArrayList of fetched StoryInfo objects

      • isBusy

        public boolean isBusy()
        Checks if the ESManager is currently communicating with the ES Server. Used to block calls that would crash the application.
        Returns:
        true if ESManage is busy, else false
